import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { categories } from '../categories'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-categories', templateUrl: './product-categories.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-categories.component.css'] }) export class ProductCategoriesComponent { } export class ProductListComponent { // share() { // window.alert('The product has been shared!'); // } // onNotify() { // window.alert('You will be notified when the product goes on sale'); // } }
